content.rendered:
EASA APPROVED B1 & B2 AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE ENGINEERING EXAM

About UCASM:

United College of Aviation Science and Management is an approved Examination center of Air-Tech Bildung , Germany, EASA Part-147 approved maintenance training organization .UCASM offers B1(Aerospace ) and B2 (Avionics) course on aircraft maintenance engineering (non part of 147) for national and international students .

Admission Procedure:

Eligibility Criteria:H.S.C, A-level, HND, DIPLOMA, B.Sc & B. Eng in AME, Aeronautical, Mechanical, Electrical Engineering and Aviation Experience Personnel.

  • Get Register for admission test.
  • Admission test & result.
  • Interview of successful students.
  • Final merit list.
  • Submission of all documents.
  • Payment confirmation.
  • Enrollment.

Mission of the Program:

To develop human resources for aircraft maintenance engineering as European Aviation Safety Agency (EASA) standards to meet the local and international requirements of Aircraft Maintenance Engineering arena.

Benefits of the Program:

On completion of the the EASA part-66 exam the students will be able to work with Aircraft in all over the world. After some years of maintenance experience he/she will get full EASA Part-66 AME License .EASA B1,B2 Engineers are having high paid and demand in Europe, Middle East .A wonderful career is guaranteed after AIRCRFAT MAINTENANCE ENGINEERING LICENSE.

A high qualified team of professionals

The professional team of instructor is developed with specialization in Aerospace/Avionics /Mechanical / Electrical and Electronics Engineering.They have more than 20 years experience in Aircraft Maintenance.
